CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Add to Cart stage positioned above or below the Enter Payment Information stage?
SRP.A: The Add to Cart stage is positioned {above} the Enter Payment Information stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Add to Cart?
VE.A: The value of stage Add to Cart is {11304}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete Purchase is {4565}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Add to Wishlist, with a value of {18490}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Complete Purchase, with a value of {4565}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {548} Users from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initiate Checkout to stage Enter Payment Information?
SC.A: Decreased by {1590} Users from stage Initiate Checkout to stage Enter Payment Information.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 9003? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Add to Wishlist} stage has {18490}, the {Add to Cart} stage has {11304}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 4839? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 4839 and 9003? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initiate Checkout} stage has {6703}, the {Enter Payment Information} stage has {5113}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information, or from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Cart} to {Initiate Checkout} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart, or from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Wishlist} to {Add to Cart} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase, or from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Wishlist} to stage {Add to Cart} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Add to Wishlist} and {Add to Cart} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Enter Payment Information} and {Complete Purchase} stages.
